# xmlPropertyList

**Type Property**

A type that represents an XML property list.

## Declaration

```swift
static var xmlPropertyList: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.xml-property-list`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeXML] and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypePropertyList].

## Property lists

- **propertyList**: A base type that represents a property list.
- **binaryPropertyList**: A type that represents a binary property list.
